recalling_firm: Golden Crown Bakery, Inc. dba Panzanella Bread Company
distribution_pattern: WA State only
product_description: Specialty Sandwich Bread    No ingredient statement on label. No labeling agreement with consignees. Some of the packages list the name of the bread in the paper bag.    The 3lb designation is for dough weight, not net wt. Sliced breads are individually wrapped in in plastic and labeled only with a label that shows the product's name and company name. Unsliced, whole products are packed in a brown paper bag and are generally not labeled. The brown paper bags containing product may also be wrapped with a larger unlabeled plastic bag. More than one individually packaged unit can be placed in the larger plastic bag. Rolls are sold individually. Firm stated that product can be distinguished by size and shape from other products
reason_for_recall: Golden Crown Bakery, Inc. dba Panzanella is recalling all of their bread products due to undeclared soy, undeclared wheat and lack of product labeling.

product_quantity: 221 kits containing 2 individually sealed sumflower kernels/kit  for a total of 442 packages
reason_for_recall: Garden Fresh Foods Inc. is recalling 4oz individual packages of sunflower kernels that were included in   three of their salad kits.  The kernels were distributed by Eillien's Candies whose ingredient supplier, SunOpta, has stated may be contaminated with Listeria monocytogenes.  There have been no reported illnesses to date.

distribution_pattern: WA State only
product_description: Mini Roll Tondo    No ingredient statement on label. No labeling agreement with consignees. Some of the packages list the name of the bread in the paper bag.    The 3lb designation is for dough weight, not net wt. Sliced breads are individually wrapped in in plastic and labeled only with a label that shows the product's name and company name. Unsliced, whole products are packed in a brown paper bag and are generally not labeled. The brown paper bags containing product may also be wrapped with a larger unlabeled plastic bag. More than one individually packaged unit can be placed in the larger plastic bag. Rolls are sold individually. Firm stated that product can be distinguished by size and shape from other products
reason_for_recall: Golden Crown Bakery, Inc. dba Panzanella is recalling all of their bread products due to undeclared soy, undeclared wheat and lack of product labeling.
